markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Throw Rock](/Actions.aspx?ID=2272) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 206 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

he arboreal sapling Interacts to pick up a rock within reach or retrieve a stowed rock, then throws it with a ranged rock Strike that deals 2d6 bludgeoning (3d6 for a specialized companion) damage with a range increment of 30 feet.
name: Throw Rock
